metadata.title: BRABUD 1.9'' A Pair of Baoding Health Balls Chinese Exercise Stress Balls Relieve Stress with Chimes (Silvery)
features: Product Size—Each ball height (about) 1.9in, total (about) weight: 0.7lb. Because of manual measurement, the size will be a little error, please understanding.
Product Package —Exquisite packaging, Randomly send different color box.
Product Material—Made of metal with chimes, issue chimes when playing,very sweet.

Product Benefit — Health ball is a traditional folk fitness equipment, hand movement.beneficial to the brain, playing health ball, you can make people's thoughts focused on the hands, eliminate all kinds of distractions, to eliminate tension, so that the brain to relax.
Product Usage—This can be done when doing something else, like watching TV,and so on. Also a good personal collection and a beautiful gift.
description: Cloisonne enamel health balls, variety of styles, pure handmade, beautiful and practical issue crisp sound when playing,very sweet Most important : It keeps us healthy This can be done when doing something else, like watching TV, for example. Healthy ball is the traditional product of Chinese civilization. It originated in the Ming Dynasty. After dozens of process started,it has unique style.It is a kind of portable health care device and has a collection of ornamental value of the arts and crafts.
